item.title: Microsoft Build 2019 - Thoughts
item.description: Last week I attended my fifth Build (in a row! ðŸ¤¯). The conference and the company behind it has undergone a lot of change since 2015 when I first went, and I wanted to jot down my thoughts on the stuff I learned and the direction I think Microsoft is heading. What’s Hot My number one take away this year is that Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning has really matured to a point where I should take it more seriously.
